@RyanCarniato @jlengstorf @astrodotbuild @MarkoDevTeam @QwikDev I also like that @astrodotbuild looks to offer many of the tempting developer experience benefits of more heavy JS-centric tools, but without that burdening the user/device by default. Because it defaults it shipping as little JS as possible.
